mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK, ME_CCOMPANYID, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, main.ME_CUSERID, main.ME_DSTARTDATE, ME_CKANANAME, CASE WHEN ME_DSTARTDATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK,'2222/03/31','${language}') ELSE PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK,NULL,'${language}') END ME_CNAME ,ME_CMAIL ,ME_DDATEOFEMPLOYEMENT ,ME_DDATEOFRETIREMENT ,ME_ID ,MA_ID ,MA_CUSERID ,MA_CACCOUNT ,MA_DSTART ,MA_DEND ,MA_NRETRYCOUNTER ,MA_NPASSWORDLOCK ,MA_CADMINUSER ,em.TMA_EMAIL ,MAST_ACCOUNT.VERSIONNO VERSIONNO FROM (MAST_ORGANISATION JOIN MAST_EMPLOYEES main ON MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = ME_CCOMPANYID ) LEFT JOIN MAST_ACCOUNT ON ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = MA_CCUSTOMERID AND ME_CUSERID = MA_CUSERID, ( SELECT MIN(ME_DSTARTDATE) ,ME_CUSERID FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES WHERE TRUNC(ME_DENDDATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ME_CUSERID ) mindate, T_EMPLOY_MAIL em WHERE MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = #{custId} AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = #{sectionCompanyId} AND (MO_CSECTIONID_CK = #{sectionId} OR MO_CLAYEREDSECTIONID LIKE '%,' || #{sectionId} || ',%') AND MO_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND TRUNC(MO_DEND) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID = '0' AND main.ME_CUSERID IN ( SELECT HD_CUSERID FROM HIST_DESIGNATION WHERE TRUNC(HD_DENDDATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HD_CCOMPANYID_CK = ME_CCOMPANYID AND HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK AND HD_CSECTIONID_FK = MO_CSECTIONID_CK ) AND mindate."MIN(ME_DSTARTDATE)" = main.ME_DSTARTDATE AND mindate.ME_CUSERID = main.ME_CUSERID AND em.TMA_EMP_ID = main.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK ORDER BY ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK
